      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean DatabaseHandler.addRCause(rCause rc, Rule rule)
      Create an rCause Checks to see if a rCause already exists from DatabaseHandler.rCauseExists(rCause, Rule) and if returns false will add the rCause to the Database.
      void DatabaseHandler.addREffect(rEffect re, Rule rule)
      Create an rEffect Checks to see if a rEffect already exists from DatabaseHandler.rEffectExists(rEffect, Rule) and if returns false will add the rEffect to the Database.

      Add a rule to the Database Adds a rule to the Database that is passed in.

      Delete a Rule Deletes a Rule in the Database.

      Duplicate rCause checker Checks the Database for rCause duplicates.

      rCause exists checker Determines whether a rCause exists or not in the Database.
